name: Just Breathe (concretegolem)
description:
You've had a hard couple of weeks leaving your chores to get out of control, even just thinking about them is anxiety inducing. It's time to try to tackle them one by one, even if it seems impossible!

Just remember to breathe.

How to play

Clean the windows - Use your mouse to move the sponge over the dirt on the windows

Prune the plant - Click your mouse to snip away at the dying leaves on the little tree

Sort the bookshelf - Click and drag using the mouse to put the books on the bookshelf

Wash the dishes - Click and drag the dishes into the sink and then to the rack to clean them

Just breathe - Click the mouse to breathe in and release to breathe out
